com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects

Class AnimGameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects.GameObject
      • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects.AnimGameObject

  • public class AnimGameObject
extends GameObject
    An animated game object, based on the MD5 specification. Supports animation via "joints" and frames.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimGameObject(Mesh[] meshes, java.util.List<AnimatedFrame> frames, java.util.List<org.joml.Matrix4f> invJointMatrices)
      Construct a new animated game object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimGameObject

        public AnimGameObject(Mesh[] meshes,
                      java.util.List<AnimatedFrame> frames,
                      java.util.List<org.joml.Matrix4f> invJointMatrices)
        Construct a new animated game object.
        Parameters:
        meshes - The game object's array of meshes.
        frames - The game object's list of AnimatedFrame (frames).
        invJointMatrices - The list of the game object's inverse joint matrices.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrames

        public java.util.List<AnimatedFrame> getFrames()

      • setFrames

      • getCurrentFrame

        public AnimatedFrame getCurrentFrame()

      • getNextFrame

        public AnimatedFrame getNextFrame()
        Gets the next frame of the animated game object. Automatically gets the first frame again if the animation has ended.
        Returns:
        The next AnimatedFrame of the object's animation.

      • nextFrame

        public void nextFrame()
        Animate the object to its next frame. If the animation has reached the end, it will automatically start over from the beginning.

      • getInvJointMatrices

        public java.util.List<org.joml.Matrix4f> getInvJointMatrices()
